entry.title: Shahid Afridi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Shahid Afridi (pictured) broke the record for the quickest century in ODI cricket during his first international innings?

entry.title: Guapi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in local Afro-Colombian and Catholic tradition, residents of Guapi sing and dance while sailing the Virgin Mary down their coconut-candlelit river to church every Christmas Eve?

entry.title: Samuel Plata (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that before being named jach'a mallku cantonal, Samuel Plata worked as an auto mechanic in El Alto?

entry.title: Axe and Grind (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a scene in "Axe and Grind", an episode of Better Call Saul, was supposed to be filmed with a crane but was changed because the cameraman declined to execute it?

entry.title: Danny Setiawan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that despite running against a former general, Danny Setiawan received implicit backing from military officers in his 2003 gubernatorial bid?

entry.title: Messe de minuit pour Noël (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Marc-Antoine Charpentier composed the midnight mass Messe de minuit pour Noël based on the melodies of ten French Christmas carols?

entry.title: John J. Ray III (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that John J. Ray III, the chairman of Enron during its bankruptcy, said he had never before seen "such a complete failure of corporate controls" upon becoming CEO of cryptocurrency exchange FTX?

entry.title: Higginson Highway (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that some residents near Higginson Highway believe that a ghost named "Sheila" is the cause of the highway's fatal accidents?
